Gubernur Kalteng Klarifikasi Insiden Lempar Botol Minum yang Viral di Medsos
03 Nov 2019, 17:19 by Septina Trisnawati


Gubernur Kalteng Klarifikasi Insiden Lempar Botol Minum yang Viral di Medsos

KBRN, Palangka Raya: Video Gubernur Kalteng mengamuk saat pertandingan Kalteng Putra vs Persib Bandung yang berlangsung Jum’at malam viral di media sosial. Dalam video berdurasi sekitar satu menit tersebut tampak Gubernur Kalteng Sugianto Sabran marah sambil menunjuk-nunjuk bahkan melempar botol minuman ke arah lapangan. Lalu, Gubernur Kalteng juga turun dari tribun VVIP ke pinggir lapangan dan terlihat adu mulut dengan Kapolres Palangka Raya, AKBP Timbul Siregar yang turut mengamankan lokasi pertandingan.
Untuk mengklarifikasi hal tersebut, Gubernur Kalteng, Sugianto Sabran, menggelar jumpa pers di halaman Rumah Jabatan Gubernur Kalteng Istana Isen Mulang. Menurut Gubernur Kalteng, aksi lempar botol minuman yang ia lakukan adalah luapan kekecewaan atas kecurangan yang dilakukan oknum wasit.
Gubernur Kalteng mengatakan oknum wasit sangat tampak berpihak pada tim Persib Bandung. Beberapa kali pemain Persib Bandung melakukan pelanggaran hanya diberi teguran oleh wasit, sementara ketika pelanggaran dilakukan pemain Kalteng putra malah langsung diberi kartu kuning bahkan kartu merah oleh wasit.
"Berulang-ulang kali oknum wasit dari PSSI ini, kalau bukan saya yang negur siapa lagi. Karena membesarkan Kalteng Putra ini tidak gampang, butuh waktu dari liga 2 ke liga 1 kan tidak gampang," ujarnya pada Minggu (3/11/2019) di Palangka Raya.
Meski menyadari tindakannya melempar botol minuman tidak pantas, namun Gubernur Sugianto Sabran tetap menganggap seorang pemimpin dapat mengeluarkan emosinya saat ketidakadilan terjadi di depan mata. Pertandingan antara Kalteng Putra melawan Persib Bandung di Stadion Tuah Pahoe Palangka Raya dimenangkan Persib Bandung dengan skor 2-0. 
Dalam jumpa persnya, Gubernur Kalteng ini juga menyampaikan harapan agar Ketum PSSI yang baru dapat memberantas mafia bola supaya persepakbolaan Indonesia bisa maju.

Central Kalimantan Governor Clarifies Incident of Viral Throwing of Drinking Bottles at Social Media
03 Nov 2019, 17:19 by Septina Trisnawati


Central Kalimantan Governor Clarifies Incident of Viral Throwing of Drinking Bottles at Social Media

KBRN, Palangka Raya: Video of Central Kalimantan Governor raging during the Kalteng Putra vs Persib Bandung match which took place Friday night viral on social media. In the one-minute video it appears that Central Kalimantan Governor Sugianto Sabran is angry while pointing and even throwing a drink bottle toward the field. Then, the Governor of Central Kalimantan also descended from the VVIP stands to the edge of the field and was seen arguing with the Palangka Raya Police Chief, AKBP Timbul Siregar who helped secure the location of the match.
To clarify this, the Governor of Central Kalimantan, Sugianto Sabran, held a press conference in the yard of the Central Office of the Governor of Central Kalimantan, Isen Mulang Palace. According to the Governor of Central Kalimantan, the action of throwing a bottle of drink that he did was a burst of disappointment over cheating by unscrupulous officials.
The Governor of Central Kalimantan said that the referee was very much in favor of the Persib Bandung team. Several times the Persib Bandung player committed the offense was only given a reprimand by the referee, while when the offense was carried out the Kalteng male players were instead immediately given a yellow card even a red card by the referee.
"Repeatedly refereeing unscrupulous from this PSSI, if I am not the country who else. Because raising Kalteng Putra is not easy, it takes time from league 2 to league 1 is not easy," he said on Sunday (3/11/2019) in Palangka Raya.
Even though he realized that his act of throwing a drink bottle was inappropriate, Governor Sugianto Sabran still considered a leader to be able to express his emotions when an injustice occurred before his eyes. The match between Kalteng Putra against Persib Bandung at Tuah Pahoe Palangka Raya Stadium was won by Persib Bandung with a score of 2-0.
In his press conference, the Governor of Central Kalimantan also expressed his hope that the new PSSI Chairman could eradicate the soccer mafia so that Indonesian football could advance.
